ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank Raffaele Mazza from Agrotis-Laboratorio Genetica e Servizi-Associazione Italiana Allevatori (Cremona, Italy) for performing the genotyping and for his support and help. The authors thank Illumina Technical support for providing the updated manifest file with the SNPs annotated with version 11.1 of the porcine genome. The authors thank Tania Toscani from the Consorzio del Prosciutto di Parma for her support and help, and the Consorzio del Prosciutto di Parma for co-financing the trials with Ham Inspector TM in ham processing plants.
